definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
ten years of practice for one minute on the stage (idiom)
pinyin: tai2 shang4 yi1 fen1 zhong1 , tai2 xia4 shi2 nian2 gong1
containing_words.word: 臺上一分鐘，臺下十年功

sentences.english: The meeting was brought to a climax by the appearance on the platform of the rebel leader.
sentences.chinese: 起義軍的領袖出現在臺上時會議達到了高潮。

sentences.english: You don't just have to sit in the stands and gape at the exploits of others.
sentences.chinese: 你大可不必坐在看臺上，目瞪口呆地盯着別人的戰績。

sentences.english: Single set of pressing platens with both heating and cooling on the same platens .
sentences.chinese: 單套壓臺上同時帶有加熱和冷卻系統的壓臺配置。

sentences.english: Caption : BEIJING, CHINA - A daily moment of hutong named:weijia, during the early winter in beijing. a homeless cat on a window.
sentences.chinese: 北京初冬時節衚衕裏日常生活，一隻流浪貓在窗臺上。

sentences.english: Her final throw was greeted by an eruption of cheers from the stands at Sydney's Olympic park.(See photo)
sentences.chinese: 最後一擲後，奧林匹克公園看臺上許多人都爲她喝彩。

sentences.english: I bundled a bunch of branches or anchored it on the punching bench.
sentences.chinese: 我捆起一簇樹枝，將它栓在衝壓任務臺上。

sentences.english: The vice is bolted to the work-bench.
sentences.chinese: 老虎鉗是用螺栓擰在工作臺上的。

sentences.english: Then they put this"Jack-o-lantern"in their window.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他們將這“南瓜鬼臉燈”放在他們的窗臺上。

sentences.english: The vice is bolted to the work-bench .
sentences.chinese: 老虎鉗是用螺栓擰在工作臺上。

sentences.english: But you'd rather see it wave after green flags upon the platform.
sentences.chinese: 你卻更愛它月臺上綠旗後的揮舞。

sentences.english: His faithful father was always in the stands, always with words of encouragement for him.
sentences.chinese: 不變的是看臺上父親忠實的身影，雷打不動的鼓勵。

sentences.english: She kissed her mother on the platform.
sentences.chinese: 她在月臺上吻了她的母親。

sentences.english: He held a presidential review of the troops from a flag-draped grandstand built in front of the White House.
sentences.chinese: 他在白宮前面的看臺上檢閱了部隊。

sentences.english: What do you think of her runway look?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲她在秀臺上看起來如何？

sentences.english: There is porcelain vase of blue on windowsill , inserting Huang Yanyan's chrysanthemum.
sentences.chinese: 窗臺上有着藍色的瓷花瓶，插着黃豔豔的菊花。

sentences.english: Power sockets for benches will be shown in the relative plan view.
sentences.chinese: 工作臺上的電源插座在相關側面圖上標示。
